"How is that a problem with our relationship?"
"Oh, it's not that at all, it's just that I want to try something new," Mora pulls out a clear glass bottle containing a blue-green liquid. She opens it and jams the bottle into Minos' mouth.
"Ack, what was that and why does my body feel so numb?"
"It's a special fluid made by Alejandra's company. You see, me and Alej have recently settled our differences and became once again the best of friends even though she did manage to trick me into taking this one weird drug that makes me inFATuated with "bigger" guys."
"That's good to hear, but what does this have to do with the stuff you gave me and arn't I big enough as it is?" Minos said as he begins to lose his balance.
"Oh, you're big alright but not big in the right places," Mora said with now a devilish look. "I want you fatter!"

"Mmmm, yeah, NOW you're making progress...", Mora murrs, noticing Minos' limbs becoming significantly less muscular.

Rachael was soon big enough and more importantly “lite” enough, to reach Digit. However, now that she was within reach she had no idea of how to treat the Nano-zell infection. Her mind racing she knew she had to act quickly before Digit reached “Minos” size. Mmmm Minos Her eyes drifted slowly upwards to that huge hunk of beef that hovered mere feet from her head now. Oooh, she'd like to just float up there and give him-That was it! Quickly she snapped her eyes back onto the glowing globe of a girl in front of her.

Rachael had only one idea on how to fix Digit, it was only thing she could think of. She puckered up leaned in closer to Digit’s face and *smooch!* She planted a deep kiss right on the youth’s lips, making sure to inhale as much of the helium making nanozells as she could. She closed her eyes, enjoying the sensation. and hoping this would work...

Rachael broke away from the kiss as Digit flicked her wings showing that her system had restarted.

“All Systems Online…Woah…“ Digit said sprightly as her eyes returned to normal. “Rachael what happened? OH!” Digit was unable to get an answer to her question as she was to startled by the sight of Rachael expanding with helium again. Recalling her last bit of memory from before her systems crashed Digit remembered the helium nanozell situation the Las Lindas farm faced. It looked like most of the house was back to normal size now, well except Minos and the increasing larger Rachael.

As she began to bloat once more with helium Rachael did her best to explain “I…unnf… guess that the nanozells inside of you transferred to me when I …oooh… made contact with you.”

“Well then let’s try this again!" Said Digit as she flicked closer to Rachael, before adding "Uh…or maybe not..." as she remembered her system shocking experience from her last attempt.

“Well *hssh* No rush” said Rachael who was now blushing and smiling slightly as she began to enjoy the sense of engorgement taking over her body.

“But Digit, how do we get them back to normal?” Asked Mora from below, unaware that the two blimp like primes above her were increasingly less concerned with getting back to normal size.

“Simple really. You know how a balloon goes flat after a while? Well this should work the same way.We just wait for the helium inside of them to go flat” Explained the resident Nano sprite of Las Lindas.

“So… basically your saying they’re stuck like that for few days” Said Miles liking the idea of Rachael and Minos out of his way for a while.

“Uh, maybe not a day, maybe shorter, maybe longer… My sensors can’t pick up anything, this stuff is tricky." Digit said as she whizzed down and returned to Mora's side.

“Well I think we’ll manage…” Minos said his rumbling yet gentle voice taking everyone by surprise. Then adding to the surprise he reached down to pluck Rachael from the air, his overinflated limbs just managing to bring her up higher to the spacious attic of the house. “What do you think Rachael? Are you fine with being a “high prime” for a bit?” Rachael too rapt in the moment, could only nod her head and blush. Then brining her to eye level he easily raised her in closer and kissed her deeply on the lips. Rachael already light headed was thrilled, and like the others below her a little confused.

Thats when she felt it, her tail end was bunched against something… It was the wall. Slowly Minos was blowing up Rachael even further, inflating her to match him equally in size. The inflation continued tail first as she was inflated further and further, pushed against the walls until they began to crack slightly. Now far above from where anyone could reach them, and far to big for anyone to stop them Rachael returned the kiss to the bull of her dreams, blowing up Minos in turn.Now both of them were grinning in ecstasy as they swelled knowing they both wanted what was about to happen next.

“What are they...?” asked Idward finally at the surreal sight.

“Watch out they’re going to...!” Randall said announcing what was now obvious to everyone.

Crasshhh!

Rachael’s rear had swollen so much that it finally broken down the wall it had been squeezed against, then it jutted out from the side of the house, and still her big behind ballooned!

Kabooom!

Minos' big and strong muscled back busted upwards and finished off the roof of the Las Lindas ranch, sending debris scattering along the outside of the house. As the rest of the group watched wordlessly from below them, the pair floated upwards still grinning from their shared helium high.

A minute or two their swelling stop, and looking about them they realized they were…

As the floating sensation stopped, the rounded out Rachael rose up to meet him at eye level. So… how about a very special birthday present?” she purred throatily as she began to explore Minos inflated frame.

Now he was beginning to feel light-headed, almost like...laughing. He couldn’t exactly see, but whatever Rachael was doing,he was hoping she wouldn’t stop! 12521.content:
The plan for more muscle began to form inside Idward's mind when, for the nth time, he’d again been unsuccessful in trying to court the sun of his life Mora Linda out for a date.

“Come on, Idward we’re two completely different types of people” she’d said nonchalantly passing on him. Then adding insult to injury she added. “Besides what with Minos say…”

Minos! Always Minos! Minos, as Idward saw him was just Mora’s current distraction. Albeit Idward harbored no ill will towards the bull. No, Minos was just another player in this game of love with Mora. But what was it that Minos had, that he didn’t? They both harbored a deep passion for the arts, were polite, and both were well kept, it didn’t take long till the obvious answer hit him, it was their physical appearances.

Mora, Idward realized, was a woman who (unfortunately for him) was the type who went more for brawn, over brains. It was true for most women in this cruel world he wistfully reminisced, remembering how no publishers would take his original romance novel featuring a less than model male lead. In response he’d churned out a trashy novel in one night, featuring the superficial and stereotypical, muscular male lead. The publishing house had bought it instantly to his dismay, and then stuck a picture of the cliché’ muscular male lion prime Fab-Leo on the front. Idward’s revulsion grew when the book sold like hot cakes, but he’d made enough from it to work on his more subjective romance novels.

Deciding to scope out the competition he headed outside to get a better perspective of what he was up against. Heading out into the cool late autumn air, Idward watched certainly impressed as Minos lifted a massive boulder blocking a future grove, and carried it a distance to a waiting pile of rocks. Idward comparatively flexed a bicep of his own, not coming within half the size of the bulls. It reminded him of how by no means was he out of shape; his body was far from muscular.

Well he would change that, he could change that instantly! Personally he’d been fine with his body; comfortable with it as it suited his wants and needs. But this was for a different reason, this was for love! And not just any love his soul-mate Mora! With an image of a perfect body in mind, he retreated to his private writing nook in the barn, brimming with an excellent plan.

“Oh my muses, I summon you” he whispered to the empty walls.

“Yes great creator, how can we serve you!” the two wisps that were the nymphs Din and Jin appeared before him.

“I have a new plan in my eternal quest for love. I’ll need a massive body one to rival that of Minos!” He explained to them.

“Right away mast-”

“No! People will get suspicious if I just show up with a brutish figure out of the blue. I don’t want to have to hypnotize them into forgetting your mischief again. We’ll take it slow, and soon Mora will have to take notice of the new body I’ll have.”

“Once again you show your genius, our master!” Din and Jin said as they unanimously cast the spell over him.

Feeling no difference other than a light tingle in his body, he headed back and out and continued the rest of his day as normal, his magical metamorphosis began.

Snow soon covered the Las Linda’s ranch and Idward’s bulky winter attire concealed his body changes from the others. Only a trained eye would notice if his shoulders had broadened a little, or that his arms looked a little larger

What was obvious was that he was around the gym more often. Every day that winter he made sure someone saw him as he left the house early in the morning in his baggy tracksuit for the gym inside of the barn. Although when he got there he went straight to his writing and let the magic take it's course naturally, always making sure the barn was empty beforehand less someone find out about his lie.

Also obvious was that his appetite was greatly increasing, along with his consumption.

“Easy Idward you’re going to blow a gasket. Did you miss lunch hun?” Taffy had said taking note of the pile up of meat and potatoes on his plate.

“No, I’m actually carbo loading. I’ve been thinking of maybe doing a little bulking up.” he said in his eccentric manner.

This caused the others at the table to scoff at his claim, playing it off as one of his odd jokes, but they would soon learn that he was serious. Perhaps as a side of effect from the nymph's spell, Idward found himself eating platefuls of food with a rapid pace due to hunger.
Weeks of this cycle passed and soon winter had ended, and springtime had finally arrived! One certain sunny day looked to be a great for tanning, and while it was a little early in the year for it, Idward decided this could be a good chance to reveal his newly formed brawny body.

Disrobing before his room’s full length mirror he saw his body was…

“Wow!” Idward said marveling at his reflection in the mirror… It seemed like the fox’s youthful face had been detached from his once shapeless pale body and replaced on top of a lightweight bodybuilder’s. The wide ripped back, the wide toned shoulders and traps, the hard thick pectoral muscles, the thick veined arms, the six-packs showing on his washboard stomach, along with the thin waist. He removed his sweatpants to reveal his thick fibered thighs and calves.

"Magnificent!" he said as his two nymphs joined his reflection.

“Did we do good oh creator? They asked as they fluttered around his figure.

“You’ve done me so proud!” he said flexing a bicep. "But there’s still one more test left…"

The blond furred fox was eager to show off his improved physique, only a few people actually cared about asking about his unusual attire he worn that winter, so he’d actually managed to keep his developing body concealed until this exciting moment of due revelation. All would witness that he had indeed made some gains, well that was putting lightly. He was built, stacked, ripped, and gone under an unlikely metamorphosis, all in a noble quest to win the adoration of Mora.

The muscles looked good compressed onto his frame, it was a body he never would have imagined he’d actually have even in his wildest dreams.

Now it was time to strut his stuff. So sporting a new pair of tight tanning shorts (which also revealed that another part of him had seemingly grown) and donning his killer black shades he headed outside and found a tanning chair perfect to show of the goods. Idward began to bask in the sunlight that felt so good against his fur and new bulk he’d almost fallen asleep.

Stretching out in the sun, he was content just waiting for the first person to take notice. That’s when not one but a pair shadow’s blocked the sun from his view.

“Whoa!” came the voice from one of the shadows.

“What the..?” asked the voice from the other figure.

Unable to see the faces in the sun’s glare, he sat up and removed his shades to see it was…

“What the hell Idward!” came the rising voice of Rachael, standing over him.

“You’ve got so much bigger way too fast! You’re not doing steroids are you?” asked a mystified Miles.

“Yeah, like I’d poison my own body with that stuff!” Idward said standing up and lavishing in the shocked looked on their faces. Everything was so ripped and developed that two almost didn’t recognized the once pint-sized fox. “I’ve just been working out with dedication, eating properly, and resting plenty. Trust me I am not doing anything illegal!” He noticed the new deeper tone in his voice sounded sexier too, another bonus that came with this new body of his. Idward struck a double bicep pose for the duo and then crossed his arms over his beefy chest.

“Wow!” Rachael said seriously impressed with his gains. “So, how much you bench?” she asked giving his body the once over.

“Uh, what?” Idward said completely at a loss at what the term “bench” meant.

“You know bench press?” Miles asked seeing Idward was clueless. “Lift? Clean and jerk?” All of the lifting terms seemed to be flying over Idward’s head.

“Well what the hell do you do?” Miles asked.

“Well,I uhhh…he” began unsure what to say. Even with his master planning he hadn’t planned for this, he’d just have to play things by ear… ”I have a very rigorous technique, I don’t know the official terms, but I guess I could show you a little of it sometime.”

”You gotta show us your technique!” Miles begged him, eager for such a bod.

“Yeah, I can’t argue with those results.” Rachael said.

Unable to argue with the two he found himself in the barn and in front of the barn’s gym and weights. Unsure of where to start, he started with the lightest dumbbells there. The other two watched with confused looks on their faces as he lifted the very small lightweight dumbbells. Unbeknown to them, he was biding his time to think. OH, he knew that he had the body of a weightlifter thanks to Din and Jin, but he also knew that those nymphs of his were tricksters enough to not give him the strength to go along with the muscle.

“C’mon ID stop dicking around!” Miles said having enough.

“Just warming up…” Idward joked. “Got to stay limber and all that...”

“Look just show us your max lift huh?” Rachael said growing impatient. She walked over to the large barbell lying over on the ground. “It’s gotta be what? 350, no 400 pounds?

“Uh,yeah I think so…” Idward answered with an concealed gulp. Now in center spotlight he made his way to the loaded barbell. His plan would be ruined if he couldn’t at least move it, he had to try.

“Well here it goes..” he prayed silently as he began to lift. The monumental blond fox gave a slight gasp and moan as he felt his muscles augmenting to lift the weight. He easily lifted it above his head, without another sign of strain. So the nymphs had given him strength along with size. Marvelous!

“I could do maybe a little more..” he said and Rachael slid two more 50lb plates on to each side for a total of 500lbs. This time, he put on a show, trying to look stressed as he tried to lift the weight. Looks of surprise adorned the cat’s faces and they certainly didn’t doubt him now.

Wow! Such strength, as a writer himself he was one who mostly put his brain over his brawn. But now, it was if he was living a different life. He moved the weights higher almost above his head; at a level he’d only seen Minos and his incredible bulk barely lift. Appreciate the attention he was getting, loving the feeling of the pump his body now had.

“Well Idward that was amazing. Let us know if you are getting any more of that “good diet” stuff, and be sure to share some with us.” Miles zinged as he left.

“Yeah whatever you did or used, you’re almost as big as Minos now!” Rachael hooted as she left.

ALMOST as big, the remark stuck with him. Hmph, this right here was all he needed wasn’t it? Then again, if he was going to go he was going to be big, he might as well be the biggest, he reasoned. The thought of him as a 6’8” beast, that embodied the very ideal of virility was both frightening, and thrilling to him.

Idward decided that…

Over at the Las Lindas farm, things has changed for the both good and bad and somewhere in between. Minos and Rachael have finally gotten together as a married couple leaving Mora heart broken, though it was later healed through the help of Digit who has now matured into a very lovely adult spirit. Taffy and Sarah have joined together to establish a very successful restaurant chain called Neko Bun-Bun that specializes in sweets and soups. With the income coming from both the crop sells from the farm and the income from Neko Bun-Bun, Mora Linda manages to obtain enough money to buy harvesting robots to fill in the void of physical labor that Minos left. With almost everyone on the farm including Randal, who went off with Idward to help write his next best seller by exploring historical sites as references, left for their own ambitions, it leaves only Mora, Miles, and Digit.

On one peculiar day, Miles was sitting at the porch with nothing better to do but stare at the fields, where all of the harvesting robots are working. Miles' boredom was somewhat disturbed by Mora when she walked out of the door to sit next to him. To Miles' surprise (and pleasure), the busty anthro bovine is wearing a rather revealing red tank top.

"You know, there isn't much to do now since everyone's is gone," said Mora as she broke the silence. "Just the robots doing all of our work for us and all we have to do is sit back."

"Okay, Mora," Miles responded. "What are you suggesting?"

"Well, since you have been sitting on your ass almost every day now, I guess we can put that to good use," Mora said with a smile.

"Oh, what do you mean by that, my Lady?" Miles said sarcastically.

"You'll see..." Mora quickly knocked Miles out with a rag of chloroform. A few hours later, Miles wakes up only to realize that he is strapped to some kind round, soft pad. "Wakey, wakey Miles!"

"What the hell is this? I didn't know you were into that bondage thing," said Miles as he is startled by all of this.

"Oh, it's nothing like that. Not at all," Digit replies to Miles with a devious look.

"A threesome? Fuck yeah!" Miles roared with anticipation.

"You wish!" Mora said with an equal deviant look as Digit's. "You're not going to get any of this. We already have a plan just for you."

Mora and Digit show that they both share the same insanity that they will use on Miles.

It was Miles birthday on the LL ranch and that night a small party was taking place inside the farm house. With everyone gathered around the table, Taffy strode out with a chocolate cake adorned with candles and placed it before Miles. Everyone watched as Miles blew out the candles.

“So what did you wish for?” asked Sara innocently leaning in towards Miles with her eyes wide in eagerness for an answer.

“Wish?!” Din and Jin said as the silently and invisibly flickered from their perch on Idward’s shoulders at the sound of their favorite word. The two nymphs had a love for wishes but an even greater love of pranks and shenanigans. Using their near limitless reality powers they loved changing the mundane into the unexpected for their own entertainment, and this situation was no different.

“Ha-ha! I don’t believe in that kiddy wish stuff.” Miles said sardonically to Sarah. Din and Jin looked disappointed by this statement, no wish after all. Miles continued as he took a bite of Taffy’s moist fluffy cake. “If I had wished though, I wish I could eat Taffy’s cooking all the time this is fantastic!” He offhandedly remarked, the rest of the house agreed with this compliment causing Taffy to smile and bow her head in thanks.

Din and Jin upon hearing this new wish went into action. Din being the brash woman of action between the two, was about to grant Miles wish right away, raising her hand to cast a spell. She was stopped however by her blue haired counterpart Jin.

“What are you doing” Jin asked her accomplice.

"Well you heard what he said.” Din began. “He wishes to eat the pink haired one’s food all the time right?”

Jin nodded “It does seem to be a sort of special celebration for the lazy one.”

“Then let’s just make it so she wants to cook for him more often. I say we make her think he’s too thin, her nurturing instincts will take over and she’ll feed him. He'll start overeating till he nearly pops!” Din said giggling at the literal thought of that happening.

Jin thought about this, she supposed there was no harm in this plan “As long as the creator doesn’t find out it sounds fun!”

“Its fine we’ll do it overnight no one will know…” Din said excited to wreck a little havoc into the boring house.

That night…

That night Din and Jin mischievously snuck into Taffy’s room, and gave the bunny a slight zap! The next morning she would see Miles as skinny and malnourished. The imps giggled away as they waited for the magic to unfurl.

The next morning was the same routine for Taffy, waking up early and starting breakfast; First for herself (jam covered toast a side of carrot juice and coffee) then Minos who’d usually been out doing yard work, out even earlier then herself, then Mora, Idward, Sarah and Rachael, Randall, and then, finally Miles. info.brief_description: A little treat for those who want to see the men of Las Lindas expanded.
info.description:
This is the only expansion story for the male characters of the furry webcomic Las Lindas. There are four characters that will be focused on, though more may be added later on:

- Minos: Mora's on-and-off boyfriend, and the object of Rachael's affection. A bull, very tall and muscular, does most of the farmwork. He is also one of the Crests, like Ambar, Geecku, Grace and Kate, and is therefore several hundred years old, and has collected more wisdom and experience in life than anyone else at the farm can imagine. Lately, he's been showing alot more interest in Rachael and seems to be getting tired of the way Mora treats him.

- Idward Focks: Mora's ex-boyfriend who still obsesses over her. An arctic fox, rather short, skilled at writing romantic novels. He also love Dungeons and Dragons, and frequently plays it with Taffy, who seems to have become very interested in him. Overall very nerdish and creative, so much that Sarah wants him to be her teacher. His one big flaw, however, is that he's a relentless stalker, and is oblivious to Taffy's feelings for him due to his unhealthy obsession with Mora, whom he dated for about three days just over two years ago.

- Miles Lionheart: Taffy's ex-boyfriend. A cat, very arrogant, narcissistic, unmotivated, and a shameless lecher. Despite his massive faults, he has been shown to be intelligent when it comes to machinery.

- Randal Hawthorne: Mora's adopted brother who takes care of the farm's orchards. A border collie, he's a true gentleman, and incredibly girlish. He's the subject of almost as many sexual orientation debates and jokes as James from Pokemon. He loves cooking, but tends to make everything way too spicy, and is secretly in love with all four of the girls on the farm.

Here's what expansion types the stories will focus on:

* Weight Gain
* Inflation
* Butt Expansion
* Fruitification
* Muscle Growth
* Penis Expansion

And here are some rules for this story.

1. Feel free to mix expansion types within one storyline, but try to keep the main focus on the type that was originally chosen.

2. No insanely fast or half-assed growth.

3. USE PROPER SPELLING AND GRAMMAR SKILLS. I cannot stress this rule enough!

4. Females getting expanded within a male's ongoing story are technically allowed, but options for female characters to be expanded on their own will be deleted.
